publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4342 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion—That the Parliament notes that the final of the 2006 World Snooker Championship between Scotland’s Graeme Dott and England’s Peter Ebdon was the longest final in Crucible history; congratulates Graeme Dott on his 18-14 victory in the championship, and hopes that the success of Scots players at the world championships in this decade and the last will encourage World Snooker to look at the possibility of holding the world championships in Scotland in the future. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Johnstone*, Bruce Crawford*, Patrick Harvie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*, Brian Adam*, Tommy Sheridan*, Murdo Fraser*, Murray Tosh*, Fergus Ewing*, Rob Gibson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Michael McMahon*, Shiona Baird*, Frances Curran* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4342 Mr Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion—That the Parliament notes that the final of the 2006 World Snooker Championship between Scotland’s Graeme Dott and England’s Peter Ebdon was the longest final in Crucible history; congratulates Graeme Dott on his 18-14 victory in the championship, and hopes that the success of Scots players at the world championships in this decade and the last will encourage World Snooker to look at the possibility of holding the world championships in Scotland in the future. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Alex Johnstone, Bruce Crawford, Patrick Harvie, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr David Davidson, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Murdo Fraser, Murray Tosh, Fergus Ewing, Rob Gibson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Eleanor Scott, Ms Maureen Watt, Michael McMahon, Shiona Baird, Frances Curran, Dave Petrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Margaret Mitchell*, John Scott*
S2M-4342 Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion (lodged on 4 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-4342 Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion (lodged on 4 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4342 Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion (lodged on 4 May 2006) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4342 Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion (lodged on 4 May 2006) Phil Gallie*
S2M-4342 Congratulations to Scotland’s Latest World Champion (lodged on 4 May 2006) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
